name: libsigcpp
description: Libsigc++ is a C++ library for typesafe callbacks

dependent_to.name: glibmm
dependent_to.description: Glibmm is a C++ wrapper for the glib library.

dependent_to.name: workrave
dependent_to.description:
Workrave is a program that assists in the recovery and prevention of
Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI). The program frequently alerts you to
take micro-pauses, rest breaks and restricts you to your daily limit.
The program runs on GNU/Linux and Microsoft Windows.

dependent_to.name: cairomm
dependent_to.description: Cairomm is a C++ wrapper for the cairo graphics library.
